question_text: Welcome to this survey. Press Next to begin.

Please answer the following questions on your tendency to bring your complete attention to experiences occurring in the present moment.

For every question, provide a response from:
  • Never or very rarely true
  • Rarely true
  • Sometimes true
  • Often true
  • Very often or always true
